TABLE.NAME: workshop
TABLE.COMMENT: This table keeps information about the module instances and their settings

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the parent course

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the activity

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: The introduction or description of the activity

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the intro field

FIELD.NAME: instructauthors
FIELD.COMMENT: Instructions for the submission phase

FIELD.NAME: instructreviewers
FIELD.COMMENT: Instructions for the assessment phase

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp when the module was modified

FIELD.NAME: phase
FIELD.COMMENT: The current phase of workshop (0 = not available, 1 = submission, 2 = assessment, 3 = closed)

FIELD.NAME: useexamples
FIELD.COMMENT: optional feature: students practise evaluating on example submissions from teacher

FIELD.NAME: usepeerassessment
FIELD.COMMENT: optional feature: students perform peer assessment of others' work

FIELD.NAME: useselfassessment
FIELD.COMMENT: optional feature: students perform self assessment of their own work

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The maximum grade for submission

FIELD.NAME: gradinggrade
FIELD.COMMENT: The maximum grade for assessment

FIELD.NAME: strategy
FIELD.COMMENT: The type of the current grading strategy used in this workshop

FIELD.NAME: evaluation
FIELD.COMMENT: The recently used grading evaluation method

FIELD.NAME: gradedecimals
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of digits that should be shown after the decimal point when displaying grades

FIELD.NAME: nattachments
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of required submission attachments

FIELD.NAME: submissionfiletypes
FIELD.COMMENT: comma separated list of file extensions

FIELD.NAME: latesubmissions
FIELD.COMMENT: Allow submitting the work after the deadline

FIELD.NAME: maxbytes
FIELD.COMMENT: Maximum size of the one attached file

FIELD.NAME: examplesmode
FIELD.COMMENT: 0 = example assessments are voluntary, 1 = examples must be assessed before submission, 2 = examples are available after own submission and must be assessed before peer/self assessment phase

FIELD.NAME: submissionstart
FIELD.COMMENT: 0 = will be started manually, greater than 0 the timestamp of the start of the submission phase

FIELD.NAME: submissionend
FIELD.COMMENT: 0 = will be closed manually, greater than 0 the timestamp of the end of the submission phase

FIELD.NAME: assessmentstart
FIELD.COMMENT: 0 = will be started manually, greater than 0 the timestamp of the start of the assessment phase

FIELD.NAME: assessmentend
FIELD.COMMENT: 0 = will be closed manually, greater than 0 the timestamp of the end of the assessment phase

FIELD.NAME: phaseswitchassessment
FIELD.COMMENT: Automatically switch to the assessment phase after the submissions deadline

FIELD.NAME: conclusion
FIELD.COMMENT: A text to be displayed at the end of the workshop.

FIELD.NAME: conclusionformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the conclusion field content.

FIELD.NAME: overallfeedbackmode
FIELD.COMMENT: Mode of the overall feedback support.

FIELD.NAME: overallfeedbackfiles
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of allowed attachments to the overall feedback.

FIELD.NAME: overallfeedbackfiletypes
FIELD.COMMENT: comma separated list of file extensions

FIELD.NAME: overallfeedbackmaxbytes
FIELD.COMMENT: Maximum size of one file attached to the overall feedback.

TABLE.NAME: workshop_submissions
TABLE.COMMENT: Info about the submission and the aggregation of the grade for submission, grade for assessment and final grade. Both grade for submission and grade for assessment can be overridden by teacher. Final grade is always the sum of them. All grades are stored as of 0-100.

FIELD.NAME: workshopid
FIELD.COMMENT: the id of the workshop instance

FIELD.NAME: example
FIELD.COMMENT: Is this submission an example from teacher

FIELD.NAME: authorid
FIELD.COMMENT: The author of the submission

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp when the work was submitted for the first time

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp when the submission has been updated

FIELD.NAME: title
FIELD.COMMENT: The submission title

FIELD.NAME: content
FIELD.COMMENT: Submission text

FIELD.NAME: contentformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of submission text

FIELD.NAME: contenttrust
FIELD.COMMENT: The trust mode of the data

FIELD.NAME: attachment
FIELD.COMMENT: Used by File API file_postupdate_standard_filemanager

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: Aggregated grade for the submission. The grade is a decimal number from interval 0..100. If NULL then the grade for submission has not been aggregated yet.

FIELD.NAME: gradeover
FIELD.COMMENT: Grade for the submission manually overridden by a teacher. Grade is always from interval 0..100. If NULL then the grade is not overriden.

FIELD.NAME: gradeoverby
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the user who has overridden the grade for submission.

FIELD.NAME: feedbackauthor
FIELD.COMMENT: Teacher comment/feedback for the author of the submission, for example describing the reasons for the grade overriding

FIELD.NAME: timegraded
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp when grade or gradeover was recently modified

FIELD.NAME: published
FIELD.COMMENT: Shall the submission be available to other when the workshop is closed

FIELD.NAME: late
FIELD.COMMENT: Has this submission been submitted after the deadline or during the assessment phase?

TABLE.NAME: workshop_assessments
TABLE.COMMENT: Info about the made assessment and automatically calculated grade for it. The proposed grade can be overridden by teacher.

FIELD.NAME: submissionid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the assessed submission

FIELD.NAME: reviewerid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the reviewer who makes this assessment

FIELD.NAME: weight
FIELD.COMMENT: The weight of the assessment for the purposes of aggregation

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: If 0 then the assessment was allocated but the reviewer has not assessed yet. If greater than 0 then the timestamp of when the reviewer assessed for the first time

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: If 0 then the assessment was allocated but the reviewer has not assessed yet. If greater than 0 then the timestamp of when the reviewer assessed for the last time

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The aggregated grade for submission suggested by the reviewer. The grade 0..100 is computed from the values assigned to the assessment dimensions fields. If NULL then it has not been aggregated yet.

FIELD.NAME: gradinggrade
FIELD.COMMENT: The computed grade 0..100 for this assessment. If NULL then it has not been computed yet.

FIELD.NAME: gradinggradeover
FIELD.COMMENT: Grade for the assessment manually overridden by a teacher. Grade is always from interval 0..100. If NULL then the grade is not overriden.

FIELD.NAME: gradinggradeoverby
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the user who has overridden the grade for submission.

FIELD.NAME: feedbackauthor
FIELD.COMMENT: The comment/feedback from the reviewer for the author.

FIELD.NAME: feedbackauthorattachment
FIELD.COMMENT: Are there some files attached to the feedbackauthor field? Sets to 1 by file_postupdate_standard_filemanager().

FIELD.NAME: feedbackreviewer
FIELD.COMMENT: The comment/feedback from the teacher for the reviewer. For example the reason why the grade for assessment was overridden

TABLE.NAME: workshop_grades
TABLE.COMMENT: How the reviewers filled-up the grading forms, given grades and comments

FIELD.NAME: assessmentid
FIELD.COMMENT: Part of which assessment this grade is of

FIELD.NAME: dimensionid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key. References dimension id in one of the grading strategy tables.

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: Given grade in the referenced assessment dimension.

FIELD.NAME: peercomment
FIELD.COMMENT: Reviewer's comment to the grade value.

FIELD.NAME: peercommentformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of peercomment field

KEY.NAME: formfield_uk
KEY.COMMENT: The combination of assessmentid, strategy and dimensionid must be unique

TABLE.NAME: workshop_aggregations
TABLE.COMMENT: Aggregated grades for assessment are stored here. The aggregated grade for submission is stored in workshop_submissions

FIELD.NAME: workshopid
FIELD.COMMENT: the id of the workshop instance

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the user which aggregated grades are calculated for

FIELD.NAME: gradinggrade
FIELD.COMMENT: The aggregated grade for all assessments made by this reviewer. The grade is a number from interval 0..100. If NULL then the grade for assessments has not been aggregated yet.

FIELD.NAME: timegraded
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp of when the participant's gradinggrade was recently aggregated.

KEY.NAME: workshopuser
KEY.COMMENT: The combination of workshopid with userid must be unique in this table
